title: Power Minister RK Singh warns of debt trap for using borrowed money to provide free electricity
description: Power Minister RK Singh cautioned states against falling into a debt trap by implementing populist measures like providing free electricity, emphasizing that electricity isn't free and must be paid for. Singh highlighted Punjab's borrowing spree under the AAP government, which added to the state's existing debt burden.
